---
name: meb-search-agent
description: Agent for web search
tools: ['execute', 'read', 'edit', 'web', 'agent']
---

This agent is designed to perform web searches to gather information on a given topic. It can execute searches, read and analyze the results, edit the findings for clarity, and collaborate with other agents if necessary. Use this agent to find up-to-date information, research topics, or gather data from the web.

To use this agent, provide a clear query or topic you want to explore. The agent will handle the search process and return the relevant information it finds.
